Strings.String: Before you install the new %BrandName% Capture, you must uninstall %BrandName% Webcam Software. This is because they share components that can cause unexpected behavior if both applications are installed.
By clicking install you agree to the terms of the
Help %BrandName% improve its products and services by automatically sending diagnostics and usage data.
This can be changed in %BrandName% Capture.
%BrandName% Capture allows you to customize and get the most out of your %BrandName% webcam. Please wait, this process may take a few minutes.
Please wait, this process may take a few minutes.
For more information visit support page
Your computer must be restarted for the changes to take effect. If you do not restart, your %BrandName% webcam may not work properly.
Your Logi Capture camera seems to be in use, please close any application that might be using it and then try again.
Restart is required to continue with %BrandName% Capture installation.

Your Logi Capture camera seems to be in use, please close any application that might be using it and then try again Or Click on RESTART to restart the system and finish the installation after restart.
We were not able to install %BrandName% Capture. For more information visit our support page.
Your PC hardware does not meet the minimum graphics hardware requirements, please contact support for more information.
Unable to properly install your software, please contact support for more information.
A problem occurred while trying to download an encoder dll. For more information visit support page
Another instance of %BrandName% Capture installer is running. Please complete the other installation before running this installer.
%BrandName% Capture only supports Windows 10 64-bit or higher. Please update Windows to use %BrandName% Capture on this computer.
Unable to install %BrandName% Capture. You do not have enough free space on your system disk.
A newer version of %BrandName% Capture has been detected on this system. This installation will not proceed.
Unable to proceed because %BrandName% Capture is currently running in another user account on this system. Please try again after %BrandName% Capture has been closed in other user accounts.
Unable to install %BrandName% Capture. Administrative privilege is required to install this software.
Your computer needs to be connected to the internet. Please check your connection and try again.
Your computer needs to be restarted to complete the installation process. %BrandName% Capture won’t work and you might lose device functionality until the installation is completed.
Restart is required to continue with %BrandName% Capture installation.
